edu.amc.sakai.user

Class PooledLDAPConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection
      • edu.amc.sakai.user.PooledLDAPConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class PooledLDAPConnection
extends com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection
    Extension of standard LDAPConnection that attempts to return objects to the pool if someone just drops them out of scope.
    Author:
    John Lewis, Unicon Inc
    See Also:
    PoolingLdapConnectionManager, PooledLDAPConnectionFactory
